themes: lack of awareness of available resources
psychological barriers among creatives (self-worth, project value)
barriers to entry for grant support
key_phrases: Lack of awareness is the main issue
perceived high barriers may be stopping people from actually applying
The phrase 'applying for grants' does not paint a picture of ease for most people
it would likely take a wide-scale public info campaign to address this barrier
creatives also struggle with not feeling like their projects are 'worth it' or 'enough' to pursue grants for
Lowering the perceived barrier to entry may be the most effective way of supporting creatives on all levels
barriers_identified: perceived high barriers to applying for grants
solutions_proposed: lowering the perceived barrier to entry
